sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This class is used mainly as a superclass for continuous value widgets
To create an instance of class vtkContinuousValueWidgetRepresentation, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkContinuousValueWidgetRepresentation

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkContinuousValueWidgetRepresentation has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website.
